page.title: 14Tasker's Industrial Estate
page.content: Tasker's Industrial Estate is situated in Anna Valley. As Waterloo Iron Works it was the first industrial site in the Andover area. Taskers was originally an agricultural steam engine manufacturer and subsequently a trailer manufacturer. It ceased as a single factory in 1984 and the factory buildings now house several small businesses. At present these include:Norwest Socea Offices, Express Roofing, C. Lawrence Car Body Repairs, Wessex Fitness Centre, Andover Trailers Ltd., Trailer Engineering Services and Majestic Crystal Ltd. The Wessex Fitness Centre was the most recent addition. It has sessions for fitness training and aerobic dancing. Facilities are available for weight-training. It is open daily.
